text: Ruze, ki hamai sumoro ʙaroi ruzi cam' (ruzi qijomat, ki avvalin to oxirin) gird ovarad, on ruz, ruzi taƣoʙun ast. Va har ki ʙa Alloh imon ʙijovarad va kori soista kunad, gunohonasro meʙaxsad va ʙa ʙihisthoe, ki dar qasrhoi onho darjoho corist, doxil kunad. On co covidona xohad ʙud. In komjoʙii ʙuzurgest, ki hec komjoʙii digare ʙo on ʙaroʙar nametavonad sud
